items.text: flatter, length on middle. Worked off the back foot to square leg. Fielder there this time
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, no run

items.text: extra rip. Full just outside off, and the offbreak is defended off the front foot
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, no run

items.text: length ball on middle, and he shuffles across to the off side to defend
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Nicholls, no run

items.text: full on off, and he takes a big stride forward to meet the ball. Drilled to mid off
items.postText: Mark Ashley: "Re Martin Guptill dismissal - Rule 19.5.2 states "A fielder who is not in contact with the ground is considered to be grounded beyond the boundary if his final contact with the ground, before his first contact with the ball after it has been delivered by the bowler, was not entirely within the boundary" - Because he caught the ball in mid-air before landing back in the field of play, I think the Guptill call was incorrect" -- Hmm, I thought so too.
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Nicholls, no run

items.text: full on off, and angling away. Reaches for the shot, and drives to extra cover on this occasion
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Nicholls, 1 run

items.text: full just outside off, and Taylor prods forward to block. Ball rolls away to cover
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, no run

items.text: back of a length this time. Lands just outside off, and Taylor covers his off stump well, before defending from near his chest
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, no run

items.text: slower ball to end the over. Back of a length on middle, and Taylor's come forward to early. Mistimed towards the leg side
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, no run

items.text: length ball on middle, and he goes deep inside his crease, before punching with the straight bat to the fielder at long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nicholls, 1 run

items.text: length ball on off, and Taylor takes a big stride forward to try and paddle this fine. Ball takes the top edge and hits him near the helmet
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, no run

items.text: length ball on off, and skirted away off his waist to square leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, no run

items.text: length ball outside off, and he quickly rocks back to slap a cut down to deep point
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: full on leg stump, and he clears his front leg, before steering a leg-side whip to deep midwicket. Tidy work from Rubel, who displays some footwork near the boundary
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nicholls, 2 runs

items.text: full on leg, and clipped to mid-on for a quick single. They call early and run through, and complete the single before the fielder can intercept
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nicholls, 1 run

items.text: length delivery, and he rolls his fingers over the ball. Lands on middle, and gets to Nicholls near his chest. Blocked off the back foot
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Nicholls, no run

items.text: tidy again. Length ball on middle, and angling towards off. He shuffles across to his left and defends off the back foot
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Nicholls, no run

items.text: length ball on off, and this has been steered with the bat's open face to the sweeper-fielder on the off side
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Nicholls, 1 run

items.text: length ball just outside off, and Taylor walks down the ground before muscling a leg-side clip to midwicket. Fielder gets a hand to it, slowing the ball's pace, and saving a certain boundary
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, 2 runs

items.text: full toss, wide outside off, and he clobbers this past mid-on's right for four! Tries the yorker, but Taylor's step towards the bowler makes it a full toss. Bottom-hand does the rest thereafter
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, FOUR runs

items.text: length ball just outside off, and he punches this off the back foot to midwicket
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, no run

items.text: length ball on off, and turning away from Nicholls. Slapped to deep point for one
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nicholls, 1 run

items.preText: Srk: "Those were the gud old days when 100 of 20ovs means teams have got a gud start, now it is considered avg to below avg"
items.text: length ball on off, and Taylor prods forward before settling backwards. Defended
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, no run

items.text: fuller, landing on off, and driven with the spin to longon for one
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: full just outside off, and he slogs towards the leg side. Drags a shot to mid-on's left, and they take off for a single. Could be close... but Rubel's too slow to get rid of the ball
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nicholls, 1 run

items.text: nice try! Full on middle, and Taylor steps forward to play the paddle sweep. But Liton - the keeper - anticipates the shot and runs to his left to cover the region, and the ball hits his glove!
items.postText: Chris Thomson: "Re Guptill dismissal - The key part of rule 19.5.2 is where the first contact with the ball occurs. Since the first contact was within the field of play before the ball was thrown in the air then the correct call was made. This rule was updated in October 2013 to allow for catches like this to stand!"
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, 1 run
